alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:50PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BERNALILLO AND NORTHWESTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tajique, or 14 miles west of Estancia, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McIntosh, Tajique, Chilili, Escabosa and Miera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central New Mexico.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
